summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sunset Avenue, from 48th Avenue Southwest to 50th Avenue Southwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 111339 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
